After that, when I open the Window > Preferences dialog, all pages are filtered
out, except General, Keys, and Perspectives.

Cancelling the preferences dialog restored normal operation.

I re-introduced this problem while doing the refactoring to support command
parameters.  Thank you for catching it.  Fixed in HEAD.  It should be available
in I20050315-0800 and later.
Verified in I20050330-0500, windows XP dual-monitor
